signInDescription: Enter your email and password to sign in!
loginError: Failed to sign in. Please check your credentials.
companyInfo: Hub dot Information Technology , your partner in digital transformation journey.
forgotPasswordDescription: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.

registrationPendingApproval: Thank you for completing your registration. Your account is pending approval.
activationEmailSent: The company will activate your account shortly, and you will receive an email with your sign-in link.
checkEmailInstructions: Please check your email inbox (and spam folder) for the activation notification.
